changeSet.comment: Remove language team memberships from all non-translator users. Only done when users are not part of the translator group by default.

delete.where: personId in ( select id from HPerson where accountId not in ( select am.accountId from HAccountMembership am, HAccountRole ar where am.memberOf = ar.id and (ar.name = 'translator' or ar.name = 'admin') ) )
